creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: Man in long pants, naked from the waist up; he sits in a chair, facing forward and gestures with his hands; the words "February March April May/He talks to himself at night" inscribed, UC; cream background
medium: Lithographs with hand-coloring on hand-made paper in linen portfolio box
title: Study for "He Talks to Himself at Night" from the Portfolio "Lilacs and Smoke"
